Name: M61 'Skorpion' Submachine Gun 7.65x17
Description: The M61 'Skorpion' submachine gun was officially adopted by the military in 1961 and quickly became popular in parts of Europe and Africa. The theoretical rate of fire of this gun is 850 rounds per minute, using 7.65x17 millimeter pistol rounds. Due to its size similarity to pistols, it is also referred to as a machine pistol.
